title: Ameliorated trap density and energetic disorder via a strengthened intermolecular interaction strategy to construct efficient non-halogenated organic solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00291A, Paper
Shenzheng Gao, Yimin Zhang, Seonghun Jeong, Xinjie Zhou, Hao Xu, Shanlei Xu, Daqiang Chen, Wenzhu Liu, Changduk Yang, Sheng Meng, Weiguo Zhu, Xin Song
The efficiency of non-halogenated organic solar cells is improved from 17.1% to 19.4% after dibenzyl ether (DBE) additive treatment. More strikingly, the thick-film devices achieved a champion efficiency of 17.4%.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
